mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member (email, name, password, phone, role, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{email}, #{name}, #{password}, #{phone}, #{role}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt} )
mapper.select: SELECT EXISTS( SELECT m.member_id FROM member m WHERE m.email = #{email} )
SELECT EXISTS( SELECT m.member_id FROM member m WHERE m.phone = #{phone} )
